sentences.en: A member a traditionally nomadic people living principally in Kirghiz.
sentences.cn: 吉尔吉斯人主要居住在吉尔吉斯的游牧传统民族的一员.

sentences.en: A member of a people of nomadic herding tradition inhabiting Lapland.
sentences.cn: 拉普兰人居住在拉普兰的一大批具有游牧传统的人.

sentences.en: A nomadic group in the plain has been exterminated by a band of foreigners.
sentences.cn: 草原上的一支游牧民族被一帮外族人夷灭了.

sentences.en: In the beginning, they believed in Tengri Shamanism and were nomadic.
sentences.cn: 他们最初信奉萨满教,过着游牧生活.

sentences.en: Livestock population accounts for 6 0 %, mostly nomadic.
sentences.cn: 畜牧业人口占60%左右, 多为游牧.

sentences.en: Nomadic marine animals have a broad living area.
sentences.cn: 漫游生物都有很广阔的生活范围.
游牧部落在这些荒漠上游牧.

sentences.en: Since ancient times , Mongolian have been nomadic.
sentences.cn: 这次火灾使得秘府中的古籍损失过半.

sentences.en: Stop and talk with people who live a traditional nomadic lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 偶尔停下与当地的传统游牧民聊聊家常.

sentences.en: The nomadic people living in the North of our country are generally very brave and valiant.
sentences.cn: 英勇的人民之师训练有素,所向披靡.

sentences.en: They are nomadic omnivorous, and roaming like a wild donkey.
sentences.cn: 他们恰像野驴一般居无定所 、 食无偏好、行踪飘忽.

sentences.en: They long ago forsook their nomadic life.
sentences.cn: 他们很久以前就放弃了他们的游牧生活.

sentences.en: They originated from the nomadic, warlike tribes known as the Qiang.
sentences.cn: 他们来自尚武的游牧民族──羌.

sentences.en: This tribe still live a nomadic life.
sentences.cn: 这个民族仍然过着游牧生活.

sentences.en: Whereas historically the Kyrgyz were nomadic herders, Uzbeks were settled farmers.
sentences.cn: 虽然历史上吉尔吉斯族是游牧民族,乌兹别克族是农耕民族.
